settings.name: ID of Target Workflow Instance
settings.description: Type-in the API's ID (i.e. username) of the Workflow Instance containing the target Product (check https://docs.moveapps.org/#/API).

settings.name: Password of Target Workflow Instance
settings.description: Type-in the API's Password of the Workflow Instance containing the target Product (check https://docs.moveapps.org/#/API).

settings.name: Target Workflow Title
settings.description: Enter the name of the Workflow  with the target Product. While we recommend using the full title for clarity, aliases or acronyms are accepted - as long as you can recall which Workflow they refer to!

settings.name: Target App Title
settings.description: Enter the name of the App comprising the target Product. Please ensure the name of the App is accurate. Not required if 'Target App Position in Workflow' is specified.

settings.name: Target App Position in Workflow
settings.description: Enter the position of the App containing the target Product in the Workflow's pipeline. Not required if 'Target App Title' is specified.

settings.name: Target Product Filename
settings.description: Type-in the target Product name. Please ensure the filename is accurate. You can omit the file extension, unless multiple artifact files in the target App share the same basename . Currently supported target Product file-types: '.rds', '.csv', and '.txt'.

settings.name: Duplicated Track IDs
settings.description: If the target Product is a 'move2_loc' object, you can choose how to handle potential duplicated track IDs when stacking input and retrieved datasets. The 'Merge' option combines tracks with the same name, while the 'Rename' option assigns new names to non-unique tracks.
